name: Escape The Date
description:
This is a prototype game that I made for the Bullet Hell Game Jam. I don't know if I will continue this project. However, if you enjoy it please let me know and thank you very much for checking out my page!

Content Warning: contains strong language

Controls: space - progress text wasd/arrow keys - move player mouse - phone Credit: music: George Street Shuffle - Kevin Macleod
